CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Contract Signed stage positioned above or below the Sale Closed stage?
SRP.A: The Contract Signed stage is positioned {above} the Sale Closed stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Contract Signed?
VE.A: The value of stage Contract Signed is {240}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Post-sale Survey?
VE.A: The value of stage Post-sale Survey is {90}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Negotiation?
VE.A: The value of stage Negotiation is {431}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Property Viewed, with a value of {758}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Post-sale Survey, with a value of {90}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Sale Closed to stage Post-sale Survey?
SC.A: Decreased by {18} Properties from stage Sale Closed to stage Post-sale Survey.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 594? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 174? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Sale Closed} stage has {108}, the {Post-sale Survey} stage has {90}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 174 and 335? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Contract Signed to Sale Closed, or from stage Property Viewed to Negotiation?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Property Viewed} to {Negotiation} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Contract Signed to Sale Closed, from stage Negotiation to Contract Signed, or from stage Property Viewed to Negotiation?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Property Viewed} to stage {Negotiation} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Property Viewed} and {Negotiation} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Sale Closed} and {Post-sale Survey} stages.
